content: General Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Sep 2018What online platforms can I list/post/promote/advertise my freelancing services?1 answerAnswerBump0

Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 09 Sep 2018I have personally tried upwork and Fiverr. However, those were not successful. Think of yourself as the buyer of services, would you buy someone's service with 0 ratings or reviews?​I tried, it didn't work and gave up. Lowest price cannot go lower and any skill you have will probably have another thousand offering it.​0 comments0
